price: 35. Waxaana uga tagnay halkaa calaamo cad (haraaga burburkii magaaladaa) ciddii garasho leh.
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَا مِنۡهَآ ءَايَةَۢ بَيِّنَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknā min'hā āyatan bayyinatan liqawmin yaʿqilūna
